properties.areaDesc: Interior Hancock; Central Washington; Southern Penobscot
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 10:07AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Additional sleet accumulations of around one third of an
inch and additional ice accumulations of around one tenth of an
inch. Storm total ice accumulations up to a third of an inch.

* WHERE...Southern Penobscot, Interior Hancock and Central
Washington Counties.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
